TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit EventLogPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Event, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

Docs.summary: Allows declaritive permission checks for event logging.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction action) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates the permission based on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAttribute.MachineName%2A> property and the requested access levels that are set through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAttribute.PermissionAccess%2A> property on the attribute.
Docs.returns: An that represents the created permission.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the computer on which events might be read.
Docs.value: The name of the computer on which events might be read. The default is ".".

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the access levels used in the permissions request.
Docs.value: A bitwise combination of the values. The default is .
